tasks.check: deno check src/**/*.ts test/**/*.ts && deno lint && deno fmt --check
tasks.bump: deno task check && deno task test && deno publish --dry-run && pnpm i -C npm && pnpm run -C npm build && pnpm publish -C npm --no-git-checks --dry-run && pnpm run -C npm clean && echo && echo âœ… Checks passed, start bumping... && echo && deno run -A jsr:@mys/bump@1
